Therefore, the volume labeling convention that is used in this book creates DASD labels where each of the six characters specifically represents identifying information: Character 1 Identifies the LPAR or VMSSI cluster name or ID. The example VMSSI cluster in this book is identified by the character “V”. Character 2 The basic function of the DASD. Characters 3-6 The real device number of the DASD volume. Chapter 2.
